input_data.title: Manual Para Ser Feliz
input_data.overview: Juan is an accountant who for the last 10 years has worked at Etichetta Due, thanks to Daniela who was his girlfriend at the time and worked as a secretary for Osvaldo, the owner of the company. Because of his weak character and for being naive, Juan has always been the office's laughingstock. His only friend there was Eduardo until the day Juan found him having sex with Daniela (the mother of his two children)

response.analytical_summary: Manual Para Ser Feliz is a dramedy exploring themes of personal growth, betrayal, and the search for happiness. The series follows Juan, a meek accountant whose life is upended by a devastating betrayal, forcing him to confront his insecurities and embark on a journey of self-discovery. The tone is a blend of humor and pathos, examining the complexities of relationships and the challenges of finding one's place in the world. It's a character-driven narrative focused on emotional resilience and the potential for transformation even in the face of adversity.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Juan, a long-time accountant at Etichetta Due, living a life defined by his timid nature and the controlling influence of his girlfriend, Daniela. For a decade, he's endured ridicule and professional stagnation, largely due to his lack of assertiveness and Daniela's manipulation. His only solace is a friendship with Eduardo, another employee. However, Juan's world is shattered when he discovers Daniela and Eduardo engaged in an affair, revealing that Eduardo is also the father of Daniela’s children. This betrayal forces Juan to re-evaluate his life and relationships. He begins a journey of self-improvement, attempting to shed his meekness and find happiness independent of Daniela's influence. The series follows his attempts to establish a new life, navigate complex emotions, and ultimately find a path towards personal fulfillment, confronting the consequences of his past and embracing a more assertive and independent future.
response.keyword_sentence: Manual Para Ser Feliz is a dramedy exploring themes of betrayal and personal growth within a modern office environment, following a meek protagonist’s journey towards emotional resilience and happiness.
